description:
Saudi Company helps you search Saudi Arabian companies by CR National Number.

***Get full data of a Saudi Company, including:***

**Company Status** – Check if the company is active, suspended, deleted, or in liquidation.

***Contact Details** – Retrieve phone number, mobile, email, and website.

***Company Information** – Access name, type, duration, capital, headquarters, and license issuer.

***E-Commerce Details** – See if the company operates online, including store URLs and activities.

***Capital Structure** – Detailed breakdown of cash, in-kind, and stock capital.

***Partners & Management** – View partner names, roles, ownership share, and management structure.

**Business Activities*** – Discover the list of registered commercial activities.

***And Much More***
name: Saudi Company Search
title: Search Saudi Company By CR National Number
